Package controller

Class DoubleLinkedList<T extends Entity>

java.lang.Object
controller.DoubleLinkedList<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of elements in this list
public class DoubleLinkedList<T extends Entity> extends Object
A circular doubly linked list implementation.

    Initializes an empty list.
